history.proof: intros a b Q Hred Hcanon Hcomb. induction Hcomb. - shelve. - apply IHHcomb. + shelve. + shelve.

ctx: intros a b Q Hred Hcanon Hcomb.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) b : list (Term A n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) Hred : reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q (pO A n) b Hcanon : canonical A0 eqA ltM (pO A n) Unable to unify "CombLinear ?M2234 (pO A n)" with "CombLinear Q b".

ctx: intros a b Q Hred Hcanon Hcomb.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros a b Q Hred Hcanon Hcomb.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) b : list (Term A n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) s : list (Term A n) Hred : reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q s b Hcanon : canonical A0 eqA ltM s a : Term A n p, q : list (Term A n) H : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a H0 : inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM q Q Hcomb : CombLinear Q p H1 : eqP A eqA n s (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec (mults multA (n:=n) a q) p) IHHcomb : reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p b -> canonical A0 eqA ltM p -> CombLinear Q b Unable to unify "CombLinear ?M2234 s" with "CombLinear Q b".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)

Goal:
forall (a b : list (Term A n)) (Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)), reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q a b -> canonical A0 eqA ltM a -> CombLinear Q a -> CombLinear Q b

Premises:
Inductive CombLinear (Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)) : list (Term A n) -> Prop := CombLinear_0 : CombLinear Q (pO A n) | CombLinear_1 : forall (a : Term A n) (p q s : list (Term A n)), ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM q Q -> CombLinear Q p -> eqP A eqA n s (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec (mults multA (n:=n) a q) p) -> CombLinear Q s Arguments CombLinear (_ _)%list_scope Arguments CombLinear_0 _%list_scope Arguments CombLinear_1 _%list_scope _ (_ _ _)%list_scope
mult_mon : forall d : nat, mon d -> mon d -> mon d
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
canonical : forall A : Type, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> forall n : nat, (mon n -> mon n -> Prop) -> list (Term A n) -> Prop
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
OrderStructure : forall A : Type, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> (A -> A -> A) -> Prop
zero_mon : forall d : nat, mon d
reduceplus : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A), A -> forall eqA : A -> A -> Prop, (A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A) -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop), (forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}) -> list (poly A0 eqA ltM) -> list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) -> Prop
Inductive mon : nat -> Set := n_0 : mon 0 | c_n : forall d : nat, nat -> mon d -> mon (S d) Arguments mon _%nat_scope Arguments c_n (_ _)%nat_scope
poly : forall A : Type, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> forall n : nat, (mon n -> mon n -> Prop) -> Type
CoefStructure : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A), A -> forall eqA : A -> A -> Prop, (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A) -> Prop
red_minus_zero_reduce : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> exists r1 : list (Term A n), reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p r1 /\ reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q q r1

```coq
intros a b Q Hred Hcanon Hcomb.
induction Hcomb.
- apply CombLinear_0.
- apply CombLinear_1 with (p:=p) (q:=q) (s:=s).
  + apply H.
  + apply H0.
  + apply IHHcomb.
  + apply H1.
Qed.
```

original: intros a b Q Hred Hcanon Hcomb. induction Hcomb. - apply CombLinear_0. - apply CombLinear_1 with (p:=p) (q:=q) (s:=s). + apply H. + apply H0. + apply IHHcomb. + apply H1.
